summary: Nick Cave and the Bad Seeds are an Australian rock band formed in 1983. The group includes members from different countries and has released 18 studio albums. They started with a post-punk and gothic rock sound, then softened it, and later added electronic and ambient styles. The band was created after Nick Cave's previous band, the Birthday Party, broke up. Over time, they've changed their lineup and music, making them one of the most unique and popular alternative rock bands since the 1980s.
title: Nick Cave and the Bad Seeds
